exercises.name: Push-up
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position, hands shoulder-width apart. Lower chest to ground keeping body straight. Push back up to start.

exercises.name: Wide Push-up
exercises.description: Push-up with hands wider than shoulders
exercises.instructions: Place hands wider than shoulder-width. Lower chest to ground. Push back up. Emphasizes chest.

exercises.name: Diamond Push-up
exercises.description: Push-up with hands together forming a diamond
exercises.instructions: Place hands together under chest, thumbs and index fingers touching. Lower chest to hands. Push back up.

exercises.name: Burpee
exercises.instructions: From standing, squat down and place hands on floor. Jump feet back to plank. Do a push-up. Jump feet forward. Explode up into a jump.

exercises.name: Air Squat
exercises.instructions: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart. Lower until thighs are parallel to ground. Keep weight in heels. Stand back up.

exercises.name: Jump Squat
exercises.instructions: Perform an air squat. At the bottom, explode up into a jump. Land softly and immediately descend into next squat.

exercises.name: Forward Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step forward with one leg, lowering until both knees are at 90 degrees. Push back to standing. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Reverse Lunge
exercises.instructions: Step backward with one leg, lowering until both knees are at 90 degrees. Push back to standing. Alternate legs.

exercises.name: Jump Lunge
exercises.instructions: From lunge position, explode up and switch legs mid-air. Land softly in opposite lunge position.

exercises.name: Plank
exercises.instructions: Hold push-up position with body in straight line from head to heels. Engage core. Keep hips level.

exercises.name: Side Plank
exercises.instructions: Lie on side, prop up on forearm. Lift hips so body forms straight line. Hold. Switch sides.

exercises.name: Mountain Climber
exercises.instructions: Start in plank position. Drive one knee toward chest, then quickly switch legs. Keep hips low and move fast.

exercises.name: Jumping Jack
exercises.instructions: Jump feet out while raising arms overhead. Jump feet together while lowering arms. Repeat rapidly.

exercises.name: High Knees
exercises.description: Running in place with high knee drive
exercises.instructions: Run in place, driving knees up to hip height. Pump arms. Stay on balls of feet.

exercises.name: Butt Kicks
exercises.description: Running in place kicking heels to glutes
exercises.instructions: Run in place, kicking heels up toward glutes. Pump arms. Stay on balls of feet.

exercises.name: Crunch
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, hands behind head. Curl shoulders off ground toward knees. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Sit-up
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, hands behind head or crossed on chest. Sit all the way up. Lower with control.

exercises.name: V-Up
exercises.instructions: Lie flat on back, arms overhead. Simultaneously lift legs and torso, reaching hands toward toes. Lower with control.

exercises.name: Leg Raise
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, hands under hips. Keeping legs straight, raise them to 90 degrees. Lower slowly without touching ground.

exercises.name: Flutter Kick
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, hands under hips. Lift legs slightly off ground. Alternate kicking legs up and down in small range.

exercises.name: Bicycle Crunch
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, hands behind head. Bring opposite elbow to knee while extending other leg. Alternate sides in cycling motion.

exercises.name: Tricep Dip
exercises.description: Upper body pushing exercise using chair or bench
exercises.instructions: Hands on edge of chair behind you. Lower body by bending elbows to 90 degrees. Push back up.

exercises.name: Pike Push-up
exercises.instructions: Start in downward dog position. Bend elbows and lower head toward ground. Push back up.

exercises.name: Wall Sit
exercises.instructions: Lean against wall, slide down until thighs are parallel to ground. Hold position. Keep back flat against wall.

exercises.name: Glute Bridge
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, knees bent, feet flat. Drive through heels to lift hips until body forms straight line. Squeeze glutes at top.

exercises.name: Calf Raise
exercises.instructions: Stand on edge of step or flat ground. Rise up onto toes. Lower heels below step level. Repeat.

exercises.name: Superman
exercises.instructions: Lie face down, arms extended overhead. Simultaneously lift arms, chest, and legs off ground. Hold briefly. Lower.

exercises.name: Box Jump
exercises.description: Explosive lower body exercise using sturdy surface
exercises.instructions: Stand facing box or sturdy platform. Swing arms and jump onto box, landing softly. Step down and repeat.

exercises.name: Tuck Jump
exercises.instructions: Jump straight up, pulling knees to chest at peak. Land softly and immediately jump again.

exercises.name: Inchworm
exercises.description: Full body mobility and strength exercise
exercises.instructions: From standing, bend forward and walk hands out to plank. Do a push-up (optional). Walk hands back to feet. Stand.

exercises.name: Bear Crawl
exercises.instructions: Start on hands and knees, lift knees slightly off ground. Crawl forward moving opposite hand and foot together.

exercises.name: Skater
exercises.instructions: Jump laterally to one side, landing on outside foot. Swing other leg behind. Jump to other side. Repeat.

exercises.name: Russian Twist
exercises.instructions: Sit with knees bent, feet off ground. Lean back slightly. Rotate torso side to side, touching ground beside hips.

exercises.name: Dead Bug
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, arms extended up, knees at 90 degrees. Lower opposite arm and leg toward ground. Return. Alternate.

exercises.name: Hollow Hold
exercises.instructions: Lie on back, arms overhead. Lift shoulders and legs off ground, pressing lower back into floor. Hold.
